document.full_text: several thousand japanese anti-nuclear protesters marched in the rain on saturday, welcoming a call from the prime minister to shut down a plant in central japan and urging him to close more to avoid another nuclear crisis.
document.title: japan anti-nuclear protesters rally after pm call to close plant
lines_and_colors: several thousand japanese anti-nuclear protesters marched in the rain on saturday, welcoming a call from the prime minister to shut down a plant in central japan and urging him to close more to avoid another nuclear crisis.
